timeline.bodyText:
Shouldn't there also be an error on this line? Either that the inferred type argument is incompatible or that the argument is incompatible?
I guess that is masked by #979 work-arounds, but it might be good to highlight that we would expect an error here.
This is important if passThrough is in a library and we don't "see" that there is an error in the implementation.
timeline.author: wmdietl
